biotools.summary: It is an R/Bioconductor package for scale-space transformation and visualization of 4C-seq data. The scale-space transformation is a multi-scale visualization technique to transform a 2D signal into a tesselation in the scale space by applying different smoothing kernels. This transformation allows for explorative analysis and comparisons of the data's structure with other samples.
